nodes.text: A video store was, presumably, a business that rents holomovies. Video stores were common on the planet Coruscant, where billboards and signs were put up in order to advertise them. One such video store was Pawp.

In The Clone Wars episode Duchess of Mandalore, the all-Aurebesh video store advertisement that Obi-Wan Kenobi throws the assassin into says "KL FKJ GD" - "FAD FA FED". It is not known if this is the name of a video store, or something else entirely. The same billboard, with the same text, can be seen behind Cad Bane in the episode Evil Plans, and outside Trueping's in Deception (although in the latter episode, the "video store" part is unreadble).
